summary: Defines ControlNet extensions for the Stable Diffusion 3 transformer, offering a specialized control net model that configures attention processors, supports gradient checkpointing, fused QKV projections, and chunked forward passes, as well as a wrapper that combines multiple such control nets to deliver aggregated conditioning signals to the UNet during diffusion denoising.
business_intent: Enable developers to incorporate fine‑grained, external conditioning (e.g., depth maps, poses) into Stable Diffusion 3 pipelines, allowing controllable image synthesis and the flexible composition of several control signals within a single diffusion workflow.
